title: Tone Vays
body:
IP Objective: Tone Vays
Minimum Fund Raising Target: 500 000
Maximum Fund Raising Target: 1 000 000
Stake Pool Start Date: 2021.12.01  18:00
Stake Pool End Time: 2021.12.05    19:00

An advocate of economic freedom through crypto tech, Tone Vays is a blockchain and financial advisor who runs channels on several online platforms, including Instagram, YouTube, and his own website, ToneVays.com. As an independent content creator, his eponymous YouTube channel contains a variety of videos that tackle Bitcoin, including Bitcoin trading, Bitcoin law, and Bitcoin news. 

He’s active on Twitter and has approximately 240,000 followers on the platform, where he delivers Bitcoin updates, projections, and life lessons in the context of Bitcoin and crypto.
author: 0x6c665834015f725Bd27FECDA2394806BE3b8D6d9
